Title: Grease
Writer: Jim Jacobs (based on the original musical by), Warren Casey (based on the original musical by), Bronte Woodard (screenplay by), Allan Carr (adaptation)
Actors: John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway
Plot: Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 9 nominations.
